page.title: 05A miner's work
page.content:
From 8 a.m. my work is to maintain Hydraulic Power Supports, there are 120 on the coal face where I work. Each power support has six hydraulically powered legs, each leg supporting a maximum of 40 tonnes per power support. These supports are used in all the coal faces in the Colliery. I have to ensure that the power pump and hydraulic are working at maximum pressure of 2500 p.s.i. at all times so that the men working on the coal face can produce coal in safety.
At 1.15 p.m. I ride the conveyor belt back to the place for boarding man-riding train which takes me back to the bottom of the shaft. I ascend to the top of the shaft, it is now 2.15 p.m. and I see blue sky once more.
